Title: Language Research Group
Body: Date: Wed, 20 Nov 1996 19:19:11 GMT Server: Apache/1.1.1 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 1026 Last-modified: Fri, 05 Apr 1996 00:32:12 GMT Language Research Group Language Research Group Home Page The Language Research Group at Buffalo The Language Research Group (LRG) at Buffalo, coordinated by Professor Bharat Jayaraman , is a loose confederation of people interested in topics in programming languages and systems, ranging from theory to implementation to applications.
